subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Milan Hejduk had three goals and three assists, and Paul Stastny added two goals and three assists Sunday night to help the Colorado Avalanche to a 9-5 victory over the visiting St. Louis Blues.
snippet: Milan Hejduk had three goals and three assists, and Paul Stastny added two goals and three assists Sunday night to help the Colorado Avalanche to a 9-5 victory over the visiting St. Louis Blues.
